caption: In this episode, two main characters become embroiled in a massive terrorist uprising, while one of them also discovers the truth behind Jack the Ripper. There are some conflicts between Lyric and Philip, but eventually, the two main characters successfully resolve the crisis and one of them confesses his true identity to the other. Highlights include the conflict between Lyric and Philip, the discovery of the truth about Jack the Ripper, the successful resolution of the terrorist uprising by the two main characters, one main character confessing his true identity to the other, Molly introducing her fianc√© Tom, one main character mentioning a fascinating comic, a dialogue between the two main characters, one main character expressing disappointment over the other's death, one main character escaping from a building, and the confession of true identity to the other main character.
